Wix::Extensions::DataSource::AccessDatabaseConnection Class Reference

Public Attributes

string Id
 
string DBQ

Detailed Description

An ODBC connection specialized for a Microsoft Access database. May be nested under Fragment, Module, Product.

Member Data Documentation

Database file.

Identifier for the connection (primary key).

string Wix::Extensions::DataSource::AccessDatabaseConnection::Password

Optional password for SQL Server authentication.
